br.span: Kaneland Harter Middle School, 1601 Esker Dr, Sugar Grove, IL 60554, United States

div.p:
Public Act 96-0542, the Illinois Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) requires public bodies to make public records available to anyone for inspection or copying. There are certain exemptions (exclusions) allowed in the Act. Kaneland has appointed a FOIA officer. Please direct any FOIA inquiry to the attention of:
Dr. Julie-Ann Fuchs, Assistant Superintendent for Business

p.em: To Request Information under the FOIA from Kaneland District #302:

ol.li: Print the Kaneland FOIA Request Form
Complete and sign your FOIA Request Form
Submit your completed FOIA Request Form in one of the following ways:

ul.li: Mail or deliver the form to 47W326 Keslinger Road, Maple Park, IL 60151

br.p: The Act requires all FOIA requests to be answered within five (5) business days.

div.p: You are now subscribed to the KCN.
